bill.title: Safe Freight Act of 2019
bill.description: Prohibits the operation of a freight train or light locomotive engine used in the movement of freight unless it has a crew of at least two individuals, one of whom is certified by the Federal Railroad Administration as a locomotive operator and the other as a train conductor.

committee.name: Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials

referrals.name: Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
